Type annotation changes

actionPlan.snippet:
24:   | 'hardcoded'     // Magic numbers, hardcoded strings
   25:   | 'complexity'    // Function/file complexity
   26:   | 'mixed-concerns' // UI + logic mixed
   27:   | 'size'          // File too large
   28:   | 'documentation' // Missing JSDoc on exports
‚Üí  29:   | 'type-safety'   // any, as, @ts-ignore usage
   30:   | 'circular-dep'  // Circular dependencies
   31:   | 'lint'          // Universal lint rules (no-console, no-debugger, etc.)
   32:   | 'composite'     // Composite transform operations
   33:   | 'agent'         // AI agent operations
   34:   | 'refine';       // @namespace structure violations

nextAction.reason: Project has AI configuration files that define conventions and rules

doNot: Do not commit without running typecheck first
Do not push directly to main/master branch
Do not ignore TypeScript errors with @ts-ignore
Do not use `any` type ‚Äî use proper type definitions
Do not use magic numbers ‚Äî extract to named constants
Do not write functions longer than 50 lines ‚Äî extract helper functions
Do not export more than 5 items per file ‚Äî split into modules
Do not leave console.log in production code

recentCommits.message: feat(status): add AI-friendly output with next-action and do-not sections
fix(refine): check monorepo root for lockfile and README
fix(refine): add UI and Styling to project context output
feat(refine): add enhanced project analysis with AI navigation
